text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: The Sega Hikaru is a successor to Sega's NAOMI and Model 3 arcade systems. It was most notable for being the most powerful arcade system at the time but, due to its high cost, only seven games were developed for it before it was succeeded by the more affordable NAOMI 2.
